title.label: One of the best mobile RPG‚Äôs out there

content.label: We need more game‚Äôs like this on the App Store that is open world and gives you choices on what class you want to play. For example a wizard NOT everyone is gonna find playing a rouge running around with a dagger fun. But I do enjoy the freedom of choosing what you want to be and the freedom to choose where you want to go that is what makes this game fun to me. I just wish the game had more content to do but that‚Äôs about it definitely give this game a try if you love open world RPG games. ü•≥üòéüëç
I really want to like this game but sometimes when I leave a location the game goes to a black screen and freezes until it restarts. I‚Äôm on an iPhone 11 Pro.
Title says all
I‚Äôve gotten to the last castle level 28 and I‚Äôll get 4-5 rooms in and then the game crashes and have to start all over. I have leveled up twice and have lost both level ups because of it.

This is one of the most fun RPG‚Äôs I‚Äôve played in years. I know I‚Äôm discovering it late, but still really holds up graphically and game play is a superb mix of strategy and real-time tactics. 

I give 4 stars instead of 5 because it has loose ends in the story line that seem to presage expansion, yet looks like nothing is in the works. What a missed opportunity since the narrative, replay value and skill building mechanics could support tons of further content, which I would unhesitatingly pay for!

Don‚Äôt let that deter any first-timers though. Game is still fresh for easily 50+ hours given its current breadth and different experiences by playing mashups of the current character skill classes.

title.label: Only complaint is that there isn‚Äôt more

content.label: Love this game so much. This is one of the best mobile RPGs on the market.
The best iPad game I have. That‚Äôs it.
This is my favorite iOS game, I wish there were more like it.  Other reviews will give you the lowdown, just know that I concur.

This game is really good considering it‚Äôs a mobile game. I spend hours and hours on this game it‚Äôs a great time waster. Even though you can beat the game in like 4 or 5 days if you concentrate on just that character, you can replay it and play as a different class and make other choices and still have a great time. It‚Äôs really cool how some classes you need to find or do a quest to get. It would be great if you could update it like have a new class or even races like Elves or Dwarves and you start out with some bonuses to your stats, or maybe you could make subclasses. This was definitely worth the $4.99

I have played this game for years now and I love it. Great game play style, perfect for mobile. I really like the customization with classes. I had fun coming up with a unique blend like my Death Knight (knight/witch/necromancer/ice magic) I really hope for a BH Legacy 2.

I‚Äôm not in a phase of playing this game currently, but for awhile now I‚Äôve actually felt bad that I haven‚Äôt reviewed it yet. This is my absolute favorite game I‚Äôve played on a mobile device. There are no adds or in app purchases or any of the diminished gameplay that comes with those types of systems. The upgrades are simple enough to not be overwhelming, while giving a lot of choice in customizing and developing your character. The game play itself is smooth as another reviewer has mentioned. I do have a couple of small critiques, but I‚Äôm gonna put them down at the bottom with some spacing because they have spoilers. I don‚Äôt write a lot of review but I‚Äôve noticed it‚Äôs easier to motivate to write a bad review when a game pulls a bs manipulative tactic than when it‚Äôs consistently amazing. That being said this is the only game that I‚Äôve felt bad for not writing a review sooner. It‚Äôs absolutely worth the price. After I finished, I just wanted to play again to try out creating a different character. I‚Äôve done that six or so times. So if you‚Äôre debating because it‚Äôs a paid game... you should get it.

Spoilers below

My small critiques are:
1 I wish the game was longer (not that it‚Äôs incredibly short...). I appreciate that you can keep playing and fighting in the arena, but it still feels like once I get a character fully developed the games pretty much over. I know that it makes sense to plan it this way to a degree, but it would be nice to have more levels to go through. I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs typical for you all to go back and add to games, but having new levels for my already developed characters would be really fun.

2 the end boss is kind of disappointing. The main strategy involves avoiding their one shot kill move. It‚Äôs just not that fun. I beat it once then stopped short with all the other characters I developed because it‚Äôs just not all that enjoyable to play. The tower levels however are incredibly fun and probably my favorite part. I wish there was way more of that.

Anyway, really great game :)

Guess I was the better part of a decade late to the party but what a great game. You really feel like your building ‚Äúyour guy‚Äù and honestly this is best compared to a scaled back Skyrim. Battle is fun, customization is done well, balance is great and the only real problem it has is ruining me for other app games. How can I find another game this good?

title.label: New opportunity for success? Dear developers...

content.label:
This was a well thought out game, and many people love it. It obviously took a LARGE amount of work, but didn‚Äôt seem to receive the publicity it should have. I suspect this is why attention to the game dwindled (not enough potential revenue to justify further development)? 

In any case, the current times provide a remarkable opportunity. With Battle Heart Legacy already established as a high-quality game, the key is publicity. A large update (coupled with the current pandemic and therefore larger consumer base) may be enough for this game to gain the attention it deserves. In my humble opinion, allowing multiplayer (hosted on the user‚Äôs device‚Äînot something more risky investment-wise like remote servers) would most definitely generate excitement among players. From my limited game development experience, I realize this would be a huge and frustrating (haha) project. But I truly think multiplayer‚Äîthe ability to connect with friends over long distances in these harrowing times‚Äîwould push this game into the spotlight.

Battle Heart Legacy is a hidden gem, an inch away from discovery.

Honestly I have been playing this game for about 3-4 years and I have to say it‚Äôs one of the funnest games I have ever played. This is a game that only comes once in a life time, I recommend 100% to buy this game, the graphics and perfect and the game has a basic backstory that is very entertaining. It‚Äôs like a medieval fantasy game like oblivion, Skyrim, just packed with great and fun locations and missions and items to unlock. Other apps should be taking notes, the best thing about the game system is that you can play it offline, whenever I‚Äôm on a road trip or a plane too kill some time I play this amazing game. This game and battleheart are one of the funniest series ever, especially this game.üòå
This good

title.label: Proof that mobile games can be real games.

content.label: Though It starts off a little slow, it‚Äôs pure fun to build your character in all the different classes this game has for you! With all these ways to play it has good replayability, with fun and strategical gameplay to boot! The story is also pretty good, with hilarious and witty dialogue options to mess around a bit. All in all a great game, definitely worth those 5 bucks.

This game is still incredible after several years. It continues to be a mainstay on my phone and something I constantly come back to.

The art style is fun and the world itself is beautifully crafted.

The gameplay is super clever where it starts simply but as you unlock classes and skills can become as complex as you want it to be.

One of the best parts is the fact that you can specialize your character however you wish with skills from nearly a dozen different classes. Want a Bezrker with Light magic? Done. Super dark-magic Ninja? Totally doable. Master Mage that does all the magic? Heck Yeah.

Do yourself a favor and check out this game. SO worth it!
This was a stellar rpg experience. All I ask is can you please please make another one! Great job guys!

This Game is Great it‚Äôs what most people would won‚Äôt in a RPG to play how they won‚Äôt to no means end. Honestly the game would be a lot better if it just had more things to do or got another update I love playing and I want my characters power to be challenged. Please give us something new I‚Äôm sure other people would want new content as well thanks for the great content though. 

Please update game with new content games already great just would like more to venture so see new challenges
Either update this with new stuff or make a new game already.

So this game is probably the best rpg game on the appstore by far with many different skills that are diverse and pleasing, me being me ive already beaten the game like 3 times and its become boring now. Im telling you please can u add stuff in the game or make another game like this one because this was the best experience in mobile rpg ive ever witnessed. Please do something to cure my bordem and thank you. Also im rating it 5 stars because i like the game, just because im bored because  ive beaten 3 times doesnt mean i should rate it lower, but i will if you dont fix this problem!!! Ty üò∏
Gear sets would be cool
Still one of my favorite games. I wish there could be more content added or a sequel with the same game style
Cmon this is best rpg ever! How about adding stuff in or remakes?

Game is fantastic, dont get me wrong. But what really made me stop playing it is the skills and how they slowmo everything once you activate one. It becomes really annoying to a point i just cant handle it. If you could make an option where i can switch off the skills animation or the semi-lock slowmo effect of skills it would be great. I‚Äôll re-install it right now to be honest. If not, then maybe think of this suggestion for your upcoming game. There is just no way i‚Äôm ever playing a game with this mechanic.
Great game but, I think u should update it.  Add more stuff and things like that.

title.label: Outstanding game but needs more content

content.label:
Please add more content to the game!! I'd gladly pay more money for more levels, bosses, battles, classes. Not micro transactions and crap like that but I'd pay for an expansion pack.

It's been ages and no content.

Although this game is many years old, it still holds up. Simple progression story, surprisingly deep character customization, a wide variety of items (all of which appear on your character), fun gameplay mechanics, pets/familiars (!) that fight side-by-side with you, and no micro transactions!  Battleheart was the first game I purchased for my iPad and, honestly, it‚Äôs probably the best one I have as I still go back to it once a year or so and give it a lengthy play. Buy the game.

Such a wonderful RPG. And instead of having a whole team of people, you control one character with the possibility for them to have abilities from multiple different classes. 
This is easily in my top 3 RPGs on the iDevice, alongside FFVI and Star Wars - KOTOR. If you're an RPG fan, you should definitely pick this up.
Great game, but to short. Would be great if new levels were added

An excellent rpg for mobile. Good customization, difficulty, exploration, and humor. A few improvements would make it perfect. First, there is no where you can look to keep track of your quests. Second, the controls and UI in general are quite clunky. Last, some skills give inadequate information as to what exactly they do. Since the game hasn‚Äôt been updated in 3 years, I‚Äôm guessing these will never get changed, but it is a good game nonetheless.
Can you please do legacy 2 ?! Thank you !!

I much prefer Battleheart Legacy to its counterpart Battleheart. The exploring, leveling, strategy and play on both tablet and phone are outstanding. Great game for both old-school and people who have some patience in them. I hope Mika Mobile brings forth another Legacy game.

title.label: Perfect game, requirement for a sequel

content.label: This game has all the content I desire on a mobile platform, a good story, little to no glitches or bugs and plentiful with content as a mobile game. The choices actually effect the story in quite a large way such as when you can choose to help (Spoiler alert) Rose from the knights and unlock the Ninja class, or help the knights to capture Rose, same goes for the battlemage. The only thing we need left is a sequel or an update to expand the game with the resources from Battleheart 2, possibly adding online multiplayer as an option for Legacy 2? Hopefully the update or sequel will expand all the teachers and recurring characters stories. Perfect game. 5/5 stars.

Na, I just wanted to be one of those reviewers that tricked you with the title. This game is literally perfect in every way. The graphics are REALLY good and the gameplay is even better. My favorite part about this game is the class system, there are your basic ones you start out with, the Knight, the wizard, the ranger, and so on but then, as you play the game more, you unlock awesome classes like the necromancer and the monk. I personally love the necromancer but I still played  other classes too. Currently, I got bored of the game a few year ago but I just re discovered the game and I‚Äôm now wondering why they haven‚Äôt made a second game. This game does have some downsides like lack of side quests and out of the few side quests in the game, they‚Äôre not even that interesting. It doesn‚Äôt bother me that much because everything else in the game makes up for it. Please make a second game, I love this game but I wish there was more to it once you have done everything. Screw all the other 100 games placed better than this game, this game is the best game on the App Store.

For the price this is a great diablo style game with lots of options to customize your skill layout, and decent re-playability. No money grubbing micro transactions makes it right up my alley.  I would love to see more in dearth games along this line with more story, quests, and maybe a party.
Kind of crappy to be honest.  Either to easy or to hard.  Unless you want to spend tons of hours building and rebuilding your character for 2 or 3 fights in this game, I‚Äôd pick another game.

title.label: We need more games like this

content.label:
I like this game

The classes are a great fun of diversity
Story is good

Please make a number two
Maybe multiplayer?

I enjoyed other Mika titles, and based on the App Stores glowing reviews, decided to buy this one too. I was very disappointed.

The game design is very repetitive. There is no real story or sense of progress. It is nothing like the first Battleheart, either.

The final boss encounter was what put me over the edge to delete it. Pure frustration - everything from forcing you to tap through the dialog over and over, to the various one-hit RNG mechanics.

I would not recommend this game to anyone.
I‚Äôve recently gotten back into gaming and have much fun with this. However, anytime I‚Äôm in a HUGE battle and making progress.... CRASH. App just shuts down. Sad.

Beautifully made game. Blast to customize and play. 

Only downside is a weak story that disappears almost entirely in the last third of the game. In the gap between playable areas and the final boss there‚Äôs just a bunch of leveling in the arena.

You guys should add in a multiplayer function to where someone can play with their friends for example a barb and a wizard could go on missions together to win rewards. I think that would make the game way better than it already is.
So many classes that feel unique, fun, and easy to understand and play. This game was so fun.  A little on the short side? I beat it 100% in about 15 hours but totally worth every penny.

Until it crashed over and over again 3/4 of the way thru a boss fight. There‚Äôs also a real xp bottleneck and you will find yourself fighting the same battles over and over until you can level. I also found some high level stuff way easier than lower level fights that I went back to. All in all, this is a cute game, but it DEFINITELY needs more content, and clearly more support if it‚Äôs going to keep crashing. Bummed cause I played the crap outta this game.

Would love to see more playable races. Orcs, elves, werewolves...
I would not mind paying extra for that. This game is worth it. If you guys make a sequel, please allow for character transfer for those of us who have this one.
Waiting on a legacy 2

title.label: Great game, let‚Äôs you play and stay out of the way

content.label: I‚Äôm so sick of games selling me energy or using other in app purchases or ads to try to get money. Not only is this game super fun and well thought out if you love RPGs, they let you just buy it and don‚Äôt clutter the interface with ads or pop ups or send you notifications trying to get your attention. I love it and I want more games like this!
100% best game like it on iOS. Man it needs some love though. Last update was YEARS ago. Instead of BH2 I really wish this would have gotten more content or its own sequel

I have had this game for 3 years now and I can‚Äôt get enough of it.  I also own BH and BH2. I have been very hopeful that you guys will make a 2nd BH:Legacy since BH2 is now out. Though I still have fun with this one, I am excited to see what you guys could do with a sequel. :-)  Even if you guys aren‚Äôt making a sequel, this game is awesome. I can‚Äôt thank you guys enough for taking the time to polish and make the gameplay so smooth. You guys are heroes!  I look forward to playing any and all of your future games!
Thank you! :)

If you haven‚Äôt played this game yet, do it NOW!! :)

Downloaded after reading some reviews. Very disappointed. Melee battle bugs abound. To list a few - character will not attack a range weapon enemy unless you constantly s move nearer to them. Npc will constantly get in your way in combat. Game will keep opening menus randomly. Maps are to large to view. Inventory system is extremely obtrusive to use. Spend your money elsewhere...
